Hi Vivian, 

Thanks for your patience!

The page has been successfully updated as requested. However, regarding the second item, unfortunately, we’re unable to keep the text static across the remaining slides. Due to the current setup, the text reloads with each new image, even if the content remains the same.

Here is the link: 
https://stellabrokers.com.au/stella-brokers-draft

Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!

done updating the page.
except for the second request. unfortunately, we aren’t able to keep the text static across the remaining slides. The current setup requires it to reload with each new image, even if the message stays the same.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thank you! The banners look good.

Re the top banner, can we extend the display time for the ANA banner. It was too quick for people to read all the text on it.



I'm wondering if we could keep this text still for the remaining slides? It pops up every time a new image is shown but they're the same message.



Would you be able to fix the spacing / width between the 'X' and 2 logos - so it's aligned?



Thanks a lot,

Vivian

full_threads.body: @jaime follow up tasks, thanks!

Hi Rica,

Thanks - please see below my comments:


  1. Delete the duplicated text in both banners. See below.

  2. Change the background image of both banners to this image attached. Please remove the women + dog image as it's not relevant for Stella Brokers.



  1. Can we enlarge the 2 logos? Logo size should be bigger than the headline so it's more prominent.



  1. Can we use these 2 logos instead? They are in white font so we won't need white background.




Thanks a lot,

Vivian

Vivian Yeung

Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848

e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

Hi Vivian,

Just confirming that all requested updates have now been completed on the draft page:
Slideshow Updates:
    • Stella Brokers and ANA logos have been added to the first slide
    • The Stella Brokers x ANA banner has been separated from the rest of the slideshow
    • Original title/taglines for the other sliders have been retained
    • Updated banner text to:
      “Big News: Introducing new partnership with ANA. ANA members can now enjoy exclusive discounts on new business insurance policies provided by Stella Brokers.”
    • CTA button updated to: Find out more

Callout Banner:
    • Banner now styled similar to the Stella Insurance claims page, with a darkened background image for better readability
    • Logos added at the top of the banner, above the header (based on the social image)
    • CTA button text shortened to: Connect with us

You can review everything here:
🔗 https://stellabrokers.com.au/stella-brokers-draft/

Let me know if there’s anything else you'd like us to tweak!
https://stellabrokers.com.au/stella-brokers-draft/

Hi @ricaR done with the following updates

  1. ✅ Can you add the Stella Brokers and ANA logo in the first slideshow?
  2. ✅ Make this Stella Brokers x ANA banner separate from the rest of the images. We also need to keep the original title/taglines for other sliders.
  3. ✅ Reduce the wordings on the Stella Brokers x ANA banner to something below:
    1. ✅ Big News: Introducing new partnership with ANA ANA members can now enjoy exclusive discounts on new business insurance policies provided by Stella Brokers.
    2. ✅ 2x logos
    3. ✅ CTA button text: Find out more

Call out banner:
  • ✅ Can we make the banner design similar to this one on Stella Insurance claims page - that uses a background image (attached) but darken it a bit so it's easier to read the text? Or could we add another background colour instead?
  • ✅ Shorten the CTA button text to: Connect with us
  • ✅ Show the 2 logos similar to the social image (re-attached) on top of the banner, above the header.

(Time: 25mins)
@jaime follow up tasks
